casebody.data:
Louis P. Wool v. Arthur L. Larner et al.

February Term, 1942.

Present: Moulton, C. J., Sherburne, Buttles, Sturtevant and Jeffords, JJ. Opinion filed May 5, 1942. Robert M. Rosenberg, A. Pearley Feen and Louis Lisman for plaintiff. *438M. G. Leary, M. G. Leary, Jr. and Bernard J. Leddy for defendants. Sturtevant, J.

This case was tried below with the case entitled Erna T. Wool v. Arthur L. Larner, et al. The questions here presented are the same as those disposed of in the opinion in that ease handed down at the present term of this Court. 26 Atl. 2d 89.

For the reasons stated in that opinion the entry in this case is: Judgment affirmed as to the defendant William E. McBride. As to the defendants Arthur L. Lamer cmd Anna K. Lcvrner the judgment is reversed and cause remanded.
